doc:
Phillip R. Allen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phillip_R._Allen 0 Phillip Richard Allen (March 26, 1939 – March 1, 2012) was an American stage, film, and television actor best known for his role as Captain Esteban in Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984). Phillip_Richard_Allen ( March_26_,_1939 – March_1_,_2012 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor best_known for his_role as Captain_Esteban in Star_Trek_III : The Search for Spock ( 1984 ) .
